title: Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA)
description: Protect confidential information shared between parties.
content:
NON-DISCLOSURE AGREEMENT (NDA)

This Agreement is made on [Date] between [Party A] and [Party B].

1. Purpose: The parties agree to protect confidential information disclosed during discussions and negotiations.
2. Confidential Information: Includes business, financial, and technical data.
3. Obligations: Receiving party shall not disclose or use confidential information for any purpose other than agreed.
4. Term: This Agreement remains effective for [X] years from the date signed.
5. Governing Law: [Insert Jurisdiction].

Signed,
[Party A]
[Party B]

title: Employment Agreement
description: Standard agreement between an employer and employee.
content:
EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT

This Agreement is made on [Date] between [Employer] and [Employee].

1. Position: Employee is hired as [Job Title].
2. Compensation: Employee will be paid [Salary/Compensation] monthly.
3. Duties: Employee shall perform duties as required by the Employer.
4. Confidentiality: Employee shall maintain confidentiality of company data.
5. Termination: Either party may terminate with [Notice Period].
6. Governing Law: [Insert Jurisdiction].

Signed,
[Employer]
[Employee]

title: Service Agreement
description: Agreement for providing services between two parties.
content:
SERVICE AGREEMENT

This Agreement is made on [Date] between [Service Provider] and [Client].

1. Services: Provider agrees to deliver [Services Description].
2. Fees: Client will pay Provider [Amount] for services rendered.
3. Confidentiality: Both parties agree to keep business information confidential.
4. Termination: Either party may terminate with [Notice Period].
5. Liability: Provider shall not be liable for indirect damages.
6. Governing Law: [Insert Jurisdiction].

Signed,
[Service Provider]
[Client]

title: Consulting Agreement
description: Agreement for providing professional consulting services.
content:
CONSULTING AGREEMENT

This Agreement is entered into on [Date] between [Consultant] and [Client].

1. Services: Consultant agrees to provide consulting services as described in Schedule A.
2. Compensation: Client shall pay Consultant [Rate/Fees] for services.
3. Confidentiality: Consultant shall keep all client information confidential.
4. Termination: Either party may terminate with [Notice Period].
5. Governing Law: [Insert Jurisdiction].

Signed,
[Consultant]
[Client]

title: Freelance Agreement
description: Agreement between a freelancer and a client.
content:
FREELANCE AGREEMENT

This Agreement is made on [Date] between [Freelancer] and [Client].

1. Scope of Work: Freelancer agrees to complete the tasks outlined in Schedule A.
2. Payment: Client shall pay Freelancer [Amount] upon completion or per milestone.
3. Intellectual Property: Rights to work produced transfer to Client upon full payment.
4. Confidentiality: Freelancer agrees not to disclose Clientâ€™s confidential information.
5. Governing Law: [Insert Jurisdiction].

Signed,
[Freelancer]
[Client]

title: Internship Agreement
description: Agreement between an organization and an intern.
content:
INTERNSHIP AGREEMENT

This Agreement is made on [Date] between [Company] and [Intern].

1. Position: Intern will work as [Role].
2. Duration: Internship shall last from [Start Date] to [End Date].
3. Compensation: Intern will receive [Stipend/Unpaid].
4. Duties: Intern agrees to perform assigned responsibilities under supervision.
5. Confidentiality: Intern agrees not to disclose company confidential data.
6. Governing Law: [Insert Jurisdiction].

Signed,
[Company]
[Intern]
